articles.title: ‘Dumbest waste of time I’ve ever seen in my life’: Carville weighs in on Louisiana 10 Commandments law | CNN Politics
articles.description: CNN’s Anderson Cooper talks with political analysts James Carville and Scott Jennings about Louisiana public schools that are now required to display the Ten Commandments in all classrooms, after Republican Gov. Jeff Landry signed the requirement into law.
